name: Sun Shower
description:
This is my second Ludum Dare :)

Controls:

Left click on the game to move your character left and right (depending on which side of the character you are on)

Collect the suns falling from the sky to earn money and stars. Collect rain to keep the plant from burning.

too much sun and the plant will burn!

too much water and the plant will drown!

When your plant gets big, you will need to also balance the plant or it will fall over!
